definition: surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites

sentences.english: So many people feel you can be reading the book salute to know quite a lot of grace.
sentences.chinese: 所以多讀書可以讓人感覺你知書答禮，頗有風度。

sentences.english: "hope i see you well, sir, " returned the gentleman .
sentences.chinese: “希望你健康，先生，”那位紳士答禮。
